messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] FW: cnn unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: I was pleasantly surprised. I am not a big fan of Joy, but they did fabulously no allowing her to get the last word.  I would say that interview was the most
messages.messageBody:
I was pleasantly surprised. I am not a big fan of Joy, but they did fabulously no allowing her to get the last word. I would say that interview was the most positive piece on unschooling that I have seen. It seems as though something is stirring.
Steph
Sent from my BlackBerryï¿½ smartphone with Nextel Direct Connect

-----Original Message-----
From: Jenny Cyphers <jenstarc4@...>
Date: Wed, 21 Apr 2010 12:28:13
To: <AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] FW: cnn unschooling

***I saw this on CNN this morning. Here is another interview with the same unschooling family, this time with Joy Behar.***


Ok, I've seen this couple 3 times now on TV, and I've gotta say, Christine Yablonski is really a great speaker! Dad is too, I love the way they interject with each other and compliment what the other is saying! I want to meet them! I know others have, but I haven't!





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
